title: Uploading a site - minimum requirements.
text:
In simple terms, it's all about the customer.

for me it was 
1. a template, Title + list of paragraphs containing information, with emphasis on design and content.
- I didn't want to do cookie cutter template, and I didn't want to use dummy text, I want to fill my site with the content I find interest in. 
2. the text is generated from a Json file, I didn't want to write in to the elements directly (I will share my reasoning later).
3. I chose English as a language, feel free to correct me on that and maybe give me some vucabulary/grammer tips.

__________

I love feedback, please dont spare it from me about anything, I'll be grateful.
